newsitem.title: COLOMBIA: TABLE - Coltabaco first half net profit up.
newsitem.headline: TABLE - Coltabaco first half net profit up.

text.p: Colombian cigarette manufacturer Coltabaco reported the following first half results:
Net profit 6.98 billion pesos profit 5.69 billion
NOTE: All figures in Colombian pesos and subject to verification by the Securities Superintendency.
